snippet.title: Epic Manager Official STEAM Trailer
snippet.description:
Epic Manager: Create Your Own Adventuring Agency! Developed by ManaVoid Entertainment. 

Available on STEAM for PC starting December 12th, 2016. 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/391280/

Epic Manager offers a unique crossover between classic Fantasy RPGs, Tycoon, Strategy, and Sports Management.

Inspired by D&D, LOTR, Choose Your Own Adventure books, Final Fantasy Tactics, Disgaea, Footbal Manager, Crusader Kings, and Princess Bride! Just to name the more obvious ones...

Rated "E" for EPIC!

ManaVoid Entertainment is a small but dedicated Indie Game Studio from Montreal, Canada.
http://www.manavoid.com

All of Epic Manager's SFXs and Original Sound Tracks are created by our talented friends and collaborators of GeekSound Factory.
http://www.geeksoundfactory.com
